title: Mizzou celebrates Jaden birthday , Hoops win , Thanksgiving
body_text:
Mizzou celebrates Jaden’s birthday, Hoops win, Thanksgiving
Mizzou Links for Thanksgiving 2023
First things first. Let’s wish a very happy birthday to our beat writer, Jaden Lewis, who had a birthday on Wednesday and spent the evening covering the Mizzou Hoops game. A beat writer’s reporting never stops, y’all. That, and Jaden lives in CoMo so it makes it easier for him to still attend the games during the break, and he’s a lifelong Mizzou fan and says he would have been there regardless.
Speaking of Mizzou Hoops... the Tigers played 3⁄4 of a game well against South Carolina State on Wednesday. Here’s some highlights & fun facts. Read the recap at MUTigers.com.
And Thanksgiving... here’s some thankful posts from Mizzou’s various athletic teams.
Women’s Hoops has officially arrived in the Sunshine State for the Daytona Beach Classic. They’ll take on Tennessee Tech on Friday and Kent State on Saturday. I expect there will be some Mizzou fans in attendance, as my parents will be there. Watch on FloHoops, if you’re willing to fork over $30.
And finally, to get you in the spirit for Friday’s regular season finale against the Hogs, let’s watch this glorious mini movie.
And that’s all from me, y’all. I finally caught the ‘Vid after all these years and I’m just exhausted. Hope everyone has a great Thanksgiving.
Yesterday at Rock M
- From Parker: Tigers rally from 16-point deficit and cruise to 82-59 victory over SC State
- From Nate: LOOK: Shirts and Pants arrive precisely when they mean to. (We think they decided to share the video because Mizzou Hoops was losing big at the time, ha)
- From Jaden: Live Game Thread and Preview: A rebound opportunity presents itself as Mizzou faces South Carolina State
- From Sammy: Missouri Football Week 13 Bowl Projections: Where Things Stand Heading Into the Final Weekend of the Regular Season
- From Matt Harris: Is Mizzou hoops sorting out an identity crisis?
- From Nate: Arkansas Razorbacks Preview
- A new BTBS podcast (the last with BK, how sad): I am thankful for Missouri Football and see you again, BK
- Have you BOUGHT YOUR ROCK M SHIRT WHICH WILL SUPPORT MIZZOU ATHLETES? Head over to 573tees.com to shop. Local pickup available. 50% of proceeds go to Mizzou NIL fund. More designs to come.
